scripts.docker: concurrently "npm run docker-accounts" "npm run docker-orders" "npm run docker-products"
scripts.docker-down: concurrently "npm run docker-down-accounts" "npm run docker-down-orders" "npm run docker-down-products"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run accounts" "npm run orders" "npm run products" "npm run admin-app" "npm run vendor-app" "npm run shopper-app"
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-vendor && npm run ci-admin && npm run ci-shopper && npm run ci-accounts && npm run ci-orders && npm run ci-products
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-vendor && npm run install-admin && npm run install-shopper && npm run install-accounts && npm run install-orders && npm run install-products
scripts.build: npm run build-vendor && npm run build-admin && npm run build-shopper && npm run build-accounts && npm run build-orders && npm run build-products
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-vendor" "npm run start-admin" "npm run start-shopper" "npm run start-accounts" "npm run start-orders" "npm run start-products"
scripts.test: npm run test-accounts && npm run test-orders && npm run test-products && npm run test-vendor && npm run test-admin && npm run test-shopper
scripts.clean: npm run clean-accounts && npm run clean-orders && npm run clean-products && npm run clean-vendor && npm run clean-admin && npm run clean-shopper
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean && npm run clean-docker
scripts.package: docker build . -t cbe-linux-amd64 --platform linux/amd64 && docker save -o cbe-linux-amd64.tar cbe-linux-amd64
